name: Best Rally TV
description:
What game is the bestest? BEST RALLY!
What game has the absolute best everything? BEST RALLY!
What game has the best fun, the best images, the best speed? BEST RALLY!

Beat over 50 beautiful and handcrafted tracks. For more challenge, race against our drivings and earn nice stickers!

Features:

• Simple controlling mechanics, works with games controller
• Easily approachable racing game without the fluff!
• 51 handcrafted and challenging tracks
• 9 rally cars
• Achievements
• Leaderboards
• Plays with Siri Remote and Games controller!
